A

activeComponent - Variable in class model.MouseWatcher
The Component over which the mouse is hovering
addComponent(ClickableComponent) - Method in class model.MouseWatcher
Adds the given ClickableComponent to the MouseWatcher.
addComponent(Component, int) - Method in class view.LayerManager
Adds a Component to the LinkedList in order of the layer in the Component
addTile(Tile, int, int) - Method in class model.TileManager.TileGrid
 
Animator - Class in component
A class to include as a field in animated components.
Animator(SpriteSheet, int) - Constructor for class component.Animator
Constructs a new Animator with the sprites in the given SpriteSheet Reads each sprite from left-to-right, top-to-bottom
animator - Variable in class component.Component
 
assets - package assets
 
Assets - Class in assets
A class for holding, loading and unloading game assets Since each asset potentially has different behavior, each needs its own class definition.
Assets() - Constructor for class assets.Assets
 
Assets.BreakIndicator - Class in assets
 
Assets.GameBackground - Class in assets
 
Assets.LightAnimation - Class in assets
A class for the light on top of the tower in the menu screen
Assets.LoadingBackground - Class in assets
A class for the background on the loading screen.
Assets.LoadingText - Class in assets
A class for the "Loading..." text in the loading screen.
Assets.MenuBackground - Class in assets
A class for the background of the menu screen
Assets.SettingsButton - Class in assets
A class for the settings button on the menu screen
Assets.StartGameButton - Class in assets
A class for the start game button
